speech:
There are many ways to cope with stress or difficult emotions. Here are some things that might help:

Deep breathing exercises (inhale for 4 seconds, hold for 7 seconds, exhale for 8 seconds)
Meditation or mindfulness
Journaling your feelings
Talking to a friend or family member
Itâ€™s important to take care of yourself. Sometimes self-care can help boost your mood. Would you like a self-care tip?
